data.quote: I don't have a real recipe with measurements for my chicken stew. I just kind of make it up as I go. I made it for the first time one Christmas when I came home from college. It's guaranteed to cure a cold.

data.quote: I tend to think of Pluto and its moons as presents sitting under a Christmas tree. We're seeing intriguing things, but we really don't know what's in there.
data.author: Alan Stern

data.quote: At the heart of every really good Christmas movie is the threat, I suppose, to Christmas. Something is wrong with Christmas, in all of these movies.
